title: League was working fine this morning went to relaunch it this afternoon it doesn't work anymore
body:
The launcher will open I hit launch then this message appears https://gyazo.com/f4ddfc920595c6be571d41f1a632abc6

I already uninstalled then reinstalled the game I updated my computer but it still does it. I don't know what to do please help

replies.body:
Hey! I received the same error message this afternoon, even though it had worked at noon.

I would recommend downloading the Hextech Repair Tool which can be found [here](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool).

After installing it, close the program and reopen it **as an administrator**. (Right click on the file and press _Run as an Administrator_.)

I then selected these options:
> **DNS**: Use Public
**Game**: Reinstall & Clean Uninstall _(This is to make sure you get rid of any corrupted/unwanted files.)_
**Firewall**: Disable Firewall _(Just to be sure that it won't be a problem.)_

After that,  press _Start_ and the Hextech Tool should take it from there. It will eventually open up the LoL Installer and then the LoL Client.

If this doesn't work, I would reccommend sending a ticket to a Rioter [here](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), as I am of course just a random person and not a Rioter who knows all of the answers.

Hope this helps!
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}

> After installing it, close the program and reopen it **as an administrator**. (Right click on the file and press _Run as an Administrator_.)
> 
> I then selected these options:
> **Game**: Reinstall & Clean Uninstall _(This is to make sure you get rid of any corrupted/unwanted files.)_
> **Firewall**: Disable Firewall _(Just to be sure that it won't be a problem.)_
> 
> After that,  press _Start_ and the Hextech Tool should take it from there. It will eventually open up the LoL Installer and then the LoL Client.
> 
> If this doesn't work, I would reccommend sending a ticket to a Rioter [here](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), as I am of course just a random person and not a Rioter who knows all of the answers.
> 
> Hope this helps!
> {{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}

Awesome it worked thanks guy

Typically I see these errors happen when parts of the game are corrupted by interference from some Firewall or AV program. My suggestion is to make sure that any antivirus is turned off or (if you want to be extra sure) remove it temporarily. [**These steps here**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#wq3) can help out with Firewall issues.

Once you know those firewalls won't stick their noses into things they need not be in, go and try one more reinstall of League. The files should be uncorrupted, and after that you can turn the Firewall back on. :)

Let me know if these steps help you out or not, and I'll try looking for another solution or point you to the Tech crew for some more in depth help! ^^

> [{quoted}](name=DatFatRaccoon,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=Q2UPERMl,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-09-15T01:39:30.103+0000)

> 
> Once you know those firewalls won't stick their noses into things they need not be in, go and try one more reinstall of League. The files should be uncorrupted, and after that you can turn the Firewall back on. :)
> 
> Let me know if these steps help you out or not, and I'll try looking for another solution or point you to the Tech crew for some more in depth help! ^^

So I disabled my firewall uninstalled league and reinstalled it and am still recieving the same message anything else I can do?
